title: Mr. Bean Kesurupan Depe
overview: This film tells the story of a girl named Marni who is a fan of Cat Woman. She went to Jakarta to see the star's concert. But on the way she was killed and became a pocong.  At the pocong dormitory, Marni met the pocong Mr. Bean. As a white pocong, Mr. Bean often isolates himself because he does not understand Indonesian. However, after meeting Pocong Marni, Mr. Bean is crazy about her.
